roleset.name: full of caution
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to careful.01-j.

example.text: Also if you are feeding your children multivitamins you should be highly cautious of this too .
example.arg: if you are feeding your children multivitamins

example.name: All args, "about" phrase
example.text: He is cautious about who he does business with because he doesn't want the fuss of having to clean up their messes.
example.arg: about who he does business with
because he doesn't want the fuss of having to clean up their messes.
